headline: Newmont (NEM): Exploring Valuation After Strong Q3 Earnings and Ahafo North Project Milestone
summary: Newmont (NYSE:NEM) just posted a jump in third quarter earnings, supported by higher sales and the launch of commercial production at its new Ahafo North project in Ghana. This combination is catching investors' attention for good reason. See our latest analysis for Newmont. Following the Ahafo North milestone and a string of robust earnings, Newmont’s share price has soared, delivering a 111% year-to-date share price return and an impressive 82% total shareholder return over the past twelve...
